= Introduction =

SpacePong is a traditional Pong in space created by benjani13.

= Details =

You can play versus the DS or versus another player on the same DS.

|| Up/Down || Move the left racket ||
|| X/B || Move the right racket in 2player mode ||
|| Start || Pause ||
|| Select || Quit ||
|| L/R || Change de background ||
